name: Get It Together (Jimbles, Sav Emmett Wolfe, teja.mae)
name_original: Get It Together (Jimbles, Sav Emmett Wolfe, teja.mae)
description:
Come fix things for folks. Some things are cups, some things are not. They've very appreciative. Or not. Possibly.

Play it with your mouse and WASD. Point the boy with the mouse. Hold left click to drag.
Hold....him....

Credits

Art - Teja Mae Godson

Programming - James Andrew Smith

Production/design - Sav Emmett Wolfe

Composer - Tamara Violet Partridge

Sound design - David Weaver
